email.subject: Postdoc position in Trustworthy Distributed Systems (KU Leuven, Belgium)

position.title: Post-doc researcher in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems

context.mission: To empower industry partners to create better, scalable, secure, and sovereign decentralized applications.
context.collaboration: Research on Ethereum and next-generation blockchains with Web3 companies.

role.description: Ideal candidate for post-doc researcher position with experience in Distributed Systems, Blockchain, Cloud or Web.
responsibilities: Advance new lines of research in blockchain and decentralized systems.
Coach junior researchers and identify collaboration opportunities.
Lecture in specialist courses in Master-level education programs.

requirements.publications: Proven publication track record in relevant peer-reviewed conferences or journals (ACM, IEEE)
skills: Fluent in English (written and oral communication)
Independent planning and reporting of work

offer.contract: fixed-term with the outlook for a multi-year engagement

workplace.location: KU Leuven High Tech Campus, Leuven, Belgium

opportunities: Grow research experience by coaching PhD researchers and managing projects.
Access support from research experts and coordination offices.
Publish and present work at international conferences.
